source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 7: More Figures
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw the Crucifixion of Christ
A flying Angel

items.title: Beginner Sewing Course
items.headline: Learn how to sew a gorgeous pair of PJs!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to sew a pair of PJ sleepwear
Basic sewing machine skills
How to read a pattern

items.title: Learn Perspective in Procreate - One-Point Perspective
items.headline: Improve Your Digital Illustration By Applying Space to Your Art
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: To apply One-Point Perspective in 3 scenarios: a furniture, a room and a streetview
To influence the position of the viewer of the image with the horizont line
To create compositions with different vanishing point positions

items.title: How to Make Organic Soap, Make Bath Bombs & Handmade Soap
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline on Organic soap making and Bath Bombs Naturally
objectives_summary: How to Make Organic Soap, Make Bath Bombs and Handmade Soap
Creating the Lye and Oil Solutions
Molding and Curing the Soap

items.title: Fruit Bouquets
items.headline: Food Floristry. Learn a new profession step by step with us
objectives_summary: Fruit bouquets assembly
Learn to pick fruits
Get familiar with the color schemes

items.title: Art for kids : Reptile Camouflage Art-Easy, fun & Creative!
items.headline: A complete Step by step Reptile Drawing & Coloring Art course!
objectives_summary: A complete Reptile Art project with Drawing, Coloring & Background!
Drawing Reptiles from basics & creating skin patterns!
2 Coloring methods in Oil pastel!

items.title: Pen Decoration
items.headline: Pen Decoration
objectives_summary: Students will achieve skills in traditional industry

items.title: Knitting from Start to Finish
items.headline: Learning the basics of knitting from casting on to knitting and ending by binding off
objectives_summary: Basics of Knitting
Knit stitch and purl stitch
Create an article (blanket, scarf)

items.title: Oil painting for beginners - Beautiful Beach
items.headline: Learn the techniques and step by step  how to paint a beautiful beach oil painting in a correct way
objectives_summary: A process how to paint beautiful beach in oil colors
A process and structure to painting a still life from start to finish, that’s easy for anyone to manage
Learn how to blend and mixing colours on the canvas itself

items.title: One Stroke Painting/ Basket of Flowers.
items.headline: Acrylic painting of Flowers.
objectives_summary: About One Stroke Painting
How to block the background?
How to paint a basket?

items.title: DIY Mens YUKATA making
items.headline: No sewing machine needed. Everything done by hand.
objectives_summary: Finish 1/4 size or your size of Women's YUKATA (Summer Casual Cotton KIMONO)

items.title: Painting Crystals Easy Beginner Class
items.headline: We will be doing a few different sketches of crystals and then paint them in Alcohol Ink, Watercolor, and Brusho.
objectives_summary: How to paint crystals using different mediums
How to use a calligraphy pen as a tool for drawing
How to use Alcohol Inks to create crystals

items.title: Learn to draw scenes for beginners
items.headline: Learn to draw scenes using oil pastels.
objectives_summary: Learn material about the elements of drawing scenery as : How to draw grass How to draw a dense tree How to draw a coconut tree How to draw rocks How to draw waves And step by step draw views of waterfalls and beaches.

items.title: The Beauty of Symmetry in Chinese Calligraphy（English）
items.headline: Chinese Calligraphy for beginners with detailed English explanation and PDF materials。
objectives_summary: The history of Chinese writing system
The story of of 33 Chinese characters
How to write those 33 characters with a Chinese calligraphy brush

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Water Drops on Cherry - Fruit painting

visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint Water Drops on Cherry with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint flowers: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: The Art Of Smearing: Oil Pastel Technique
items.headline: discover unique oil pastel smearing technique
objectives_summary: how and why use the smearing technique
what tools and materials to use
practice smearing technique
